title: Wildcard Mask Converter
subtitle: Convert between CIDR notation, subnet masks, and wildcard masks with ACL rule generation

networkInputs.title: Network Inputs
networkInputs.titleTooltip: Enter networks in various formats for wildcard mask conversion
networkInputs.label: IP Addresses, CIDRs, or Ranges
networkInputs.labelTooltip: Enter networks in CIDR, subnet mask, or wildcard mask format
networkInputs.help: Enter one per line: CIDR (192.168.1.0/24), network + subnet mask (10.0.0.0 255.255.255.0), or network + wildcard mask (172.16.0.0 0.0.255.255)

aclOptions.title: ACL Options
aclOptions.titleTooltip: Configure access control list rule generation for network devices
aclOptions.generateTooltip: Generate access control list rules for network devices

action.label: Action
action.tooltip: Whether to permit or deny traffic matching this rule

protocol.label: Protocol
protocol.tooltip: Network protocol (ip, tcp, udp, icmp, etc.)

destination.label: Destination
destination.tooltip: Destination network or 'any' for all destinations

summary.title: Conversion Summary
summary.titleTooltip: Overview of wildcard mask conversion results

totalInputs.label: Total Inputs
totalInputs.tooltip: Total number of network inputs processed

invalid.label: Invalid
invalid.tooltip: Network inputs that could not be converted

conversions.title: Mask Conversions
conversions.titleTooltip: Detailed conversion results for each network input

subnetMask.label: Subnet Mask:
subnetMask.tooltip: Standard subnet mask in dotted decimal notation

wildcardMask.label: Wildcard Mask:
wildcardMask.tooltip: Inverse subnet mask used in Cisco ACLs and OSPF

network.label: Network:
network.tooltip: First address in the network range

broadcast.label: Broadcast:
broadcast.tooltip: Last address in the network range

hostBits.label: Host Bits:
hostBits.tooltip: Number of bits available for host addresses

usableHosts.label: Usable Hosts:
usableHosts.tooltip: Total assignable host addresses (excluding network and broadcast)

aclRules.title: Generated ACL Rules
aclRules.titleTooltip: Access control list rules generated for network devices
